member.name: T:Utilities.Interfaces.IDatabaseConnectorExtension`2
member.summary: Provide extension set of operations on top of IDatabaseConnector

member.name: M:Utilities.Interfaces.IDatabaseConnectorExtension`2.Query``1(System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Data.IDbTransaction)
member.summary: Select all rows from table (table name is a class name or specific [Table] attribute, an attribute has higher priority).

member.name: M:Utilities.Interfaces.IDatabaseConnectorExtension`2.Query``1(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{``0,System.Boolean}},System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Data.IDbTransaction)
member.summary: Select data from table by using matched predicate
member.param: Predicate of data in LINQ manner

member.name: M:Utilities.Interfaces.IDatabaseConnectorExtension`2.Query``1(System.Object,System.Data.IDbTransaction)
member.summary: Select one row from table from given primary key (primary key can be set by [PrimaryKey] attribute, table name is a class name or specific [Table] attribute, an attribute has higher priority).

member.name: M:Utilities.Interfaces.IDatabaseConnectorExtension`2.Insert``1(``0,System.Data.IDbTransaction)
member.summary: Insert row into table (table name is a class name or specific [Table] attribute, an attribute has higher priority).

member.summary: Insert rows into table (table name is a class name or specific [Table] attribute, an attribute has higher priority).

member.name: M:Utilities.Interfaces.IDatabaseConnectorExtension`2.Update``1(``0,System.Data.IDbTransaction)
member.summary: Update specific object into table (table name is a class name or specific [Table] attribute, an attribute has higher priority).

member.name: M:Utilities.Interfaces.IDatabaseConnectorExtension`2.Delete``1(``0,System.Data.IDbTransaction)
member.summary: Delete given object from table by inference of [PrimaryKey] attribute. (table name is a class name or specific [Table] attribute, an attribute has higher priority).

member.name: M:Utilities.Interfaces.IDatabaseConnectorExtension`2.Delete``1(System.Object,System.Data.IDbTransaction)
member.summary: Select data from table by using primary key
